programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki and Jason take a day trip to France in the Ferrari 812 Superfast and Aston Martin DBS Superleggera. And, Jonny is at the Frankfurt Motor Show.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes behind the scenes at the gruelling Isle of Man TT motorbike race, and spends the day with TT hero and 19 times winner John McGuinness. Tiff Needell races around the infamous TT circuit in the brand new Subaru BRZ sports car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff gets behind the wheel of the £300,000 Lexus LFA hypercar, Jason pits the brand-new Mercedes E63AMG super saloon against the legendary Audi RS6 and Vicki gets her geek on as she samples the wealth of technology in the brand-new BMW 5 Series.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny and Jimmy head to S. Korea to discover how they made world-beating cars in just a few years. Jimmy revisits the original Bentley Blower and Jason hits the track in an Alpine A110.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason's in Italy to drive the most talked about hypercar of the year - the 730bhp Pagani Huayra. He's given an exclusive tour of how this incredible machine is made at the company's HQ, and lets the car off the leash on road and track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.sub-title: Fifth Gear: GR Yaris Shoot-Out Collection
programme.desc: The GR Yaris is an iconic Hot Hatch of the modern era. To see if it earns this credit, Jason Plato puts it up against two equally iconic classic cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which TV cop car is fastest, Jonny celebrates the 75th anniversary of the Deuce Coupe, the original Hot Rod; Tiff tests the Gumpert Apollo and Tom and Jonny build their own drift vehicles out of £600 Bedford Rascal vans.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jon Bentley is on a mission to discover Britain's Most Prestigious Car. Fifth Gear have commissioned a poll by experts You Gov, and can tonight reveal the results of their 2,000 person survey.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if the Lotus Elise S is the best track car for novices - by giving the keys to her sister; Le Mans winner Guy Smith races the fastest van on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell takes two coupes onto the Fifth Gear track - the Mazda RX8 and Nissan 350Z. Vicki Butler-Henderson spends a day with Formula One star Lewis Hamilton. Tom Ford is the lucky man behind the wheel of the facelifted Mercedes SL63 AMG.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason drive an off-road playground, in a variety of tanks from submersible Russian machines to a British Chieftain battle tank. Tom Ford is one of the first people in the country to drive the brand new and utterly bonkers Tramontana R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson road tests the new performance version of Alfa Romeo's 156. She likes it and reckons it ranks alongside performance saloons from BMW, Subaru and Mitsubishi.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson jets off to Portugal to drive the new Mazda MX5. It's the best selling sportscar in the world, but have Mazda fixed something that wasn't broken.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tests Ford's Focus ST170 and concludes that it's a good car in a refined sort of way but no rival for the current hot hatch favourite, Honda's Civic Type-R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes on a rather expensive road trip - in a £250,000 Rolls Royce Phantom. Tom Ford is testing the new Porsche Cayenne Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff races the top of the range £60,000 supercharged Sport cross country against...a horse. Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out exactly how easy it is to control the £160,000 Lamborghini Murcielago.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff try to master the controls of the Red Dragon, a 1700 hp Monster Truck. Jonny drives the new Renault Megane. Tom tests BMW's premium luxury car, the 7 Series. Tom Cave - a 17 year old Welsh rally sensation challenges Vicki.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson, Adrian Simpson and Tom Ford visit the Paris motor show. They look at many of the new models revealed there including the Porsche Cayenne and Bentley Continental GT.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff heads to Anglesey for not one but two Shoot-Outs, the Porsche Cayenne goes head to head with the BMW X5 and the Renault Clio takes on the Honda Civic.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives the Pagani Zonda, an astonishing Italian supercar that boasts a 7-litre, 550 horsepower engine and 200 mph plus performance.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which is quickest - an old Vauxhall against a new one. Jonny Smith and Tom Ford contest one of motor sport's oldest and most gruelling events, the Exeter Trial. Tiff Needell goes to France to drive the new Audi A3 Cabriolet.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tests whether the claimed 0-62mph acceleration times are actually true or not. Vicki Butler-Henderson heads out to the track in two Porsches. Tiff Needell has the first TV test of the world's first underwater car, the Rinspeed Squba.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell drive some of the best cars made in Britain today. They also celebrate Britain's amazingly diverse and fertile sports car industry.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits the tiny Renault Sport Twingo 133 against the Renault 5 GT Turbo. Tom finds out Vauxhall's replacement for the Vectra. Tim relives the terror of his driving test to find out why fewer people than ever are passing their test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson report on Fifth Gear's fastest ever crash test when we crash a Smart into a concrete block...flat out. Jason Plato drives through five countries in 24 hours.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear reconstructs one of the fastest-growing types of car crash in Britain; a terror that could turn a pleasant motorway journey into one of the most frightening rides of your life.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives Suzuki's hot hatch, the Swift Sport; Tom Ford drives the awesome Aussie supercar, the Vauxhall Monaro; Vicki Butler-Henderson fulfils a lifetime ambition and drives a racing truck.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Where are your children safest - in a 4x4 or an MPV? Fifth Gear finds out with a spectacular 'worlds first' crash test between a Landrover Discovery and Renault Espace.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of Fifth Gear Adrian Simpson will be asking what makes a celebrity car valuable and what doesn't, and he'll be meeting the people who buy them and collect them.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Quentin Willson enlists the help of a car psychologist to cure one sufferer who finds it impossible to drive without swearing profusely at other drivers.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race two V8 mega-saloons. Tom Ford has the only television test of the charismatic Dodge Challenger. Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out which car is quickest between the Vauxhall Astra Nurburgring and Ford Focus ST.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason head for the racetrack in the KTM X-Bow and Lotus 2-Eleven. Jonny investigates the smarter and apparently plusher qualities to be found in the latest Golf. Tom conducts a shocking crash test which is essential viewing for all families.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason pit the Volkswagen Scirocco and Mini Cooper S against each other. Green driving is the subject of Jonny's attention as he gets behind the wheel of Honda's Insight hybrid. Tom drives the world's smallest four seater - the Toyota iQ.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki takes two Audi TTs to the track for a shoot-out - one has a manual gearbox, the other a semi-automatic - to see which is faster; Jason drives the Bowler Nemesis, a 500 bhp extreme off-roader designed to tackle the world's toughest rallies.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Tom Ford test the new Citroen C6 by recreating the President de Gaulle assassination attempt with professional gunmen.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests the latest car to join the elite ranks of road cars capable of over 200mph includes such mouthwatering prospects as the Enzo Ferrari, the Pagani Zonda, and the Porsche Carerra GT .

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is joined by German petrolhead legend and Queen of the Nurburgring Sabine Schmitz. They're finding the ultimate machine for thrill seekers, pitting the latest Caterham 7 against its hardcore rivals from Morgan and Ariel.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell wrestles with the last ever Porsche 911 of its generation, Vicki Butler-Henderson is testing a one-off £150,000 prototype version of Honda's CRZ Hybrid.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson learns evasive driving techniques from the police that chauffeur the Royal Family and Tiff Needell races two hot hatches that also claim to be enormously economical.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff is joined by German motoring legend and 'Queen of the Nurburgring' Sabine Schmitz for a head to head battle between our two favourite sports cars of the last year - the BMW M6 and Porsche 911.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell are joined by Ayrton Senna's nephew, Bruno Senna, to conduct their fastest ever track test. They hold a thrilling race between the brand new Porsche 911 Turbo S and two supercar rivals from Noble and Nissan.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason's in Italy to drive the most talked about hypercar of the year - the 730bhp Pagani Huayra. He's given an exclusive tour of how this incredible machine is made at the company's HQ, and lets the car off the leash on road and track.
